snippet: Until Tuesday at the P.G.A. Merchandise Show, golfers had not seen new clubs bearing the Hogan name in seven years. But Terry Koehler, who grew up idolizing Ben Hogan, has resurrected the line.
abstract: Terry Koehler has resurrected the Ben Hogan Co, defunct but celebrated manufacturer of specialty golf clubs; Koehler, who grew up idolizing company's founder, pledges to return company to its roots as an elite club maker.
lead_paragraph: Until Tuesday at the P.G.A. Merchandise Show, golfers had not seen new clubs bearing the Hogan name in seven years. But Terry Koehler, who grew up idolizing Ben Hogan, has resurrected the line.

headline.main: Reviving the Hogan Club Line and Returning It to Its Roots
headline.print_headline: In Reviving Elite Club Maker, a Return to Its Roots
